thread.title: Great hotel with great staff
thread.title_full: Great hotel with great staff - Review of ONE UN New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JGVA
title: Great hotel with great staff
text: I stayed with my friends at this hotel for about 4 days. We had came for the UN CSW61 conference. The close proximity to the UN was the reason I chose this hotel. The price was reasonable. The hotel rooms and service were better than I expected. The rooms were very clean. The space was large. The staff was great. They were always helpful.
